titleStmt.title: A voice from heaven: or, A testimony against the remainders of Antichrist yet in England: and in particular, the court of tryers for approbation of ministers. / Born by Gualter Postlethwait, pastor to a Church of Christ in Lewes in Sussex.
titleStmt.author: Postlethwaite, Walter, d. 1671.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Livewel Chapman, at the Crown in Popes-head-Alley.,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
